    • Method Detail

      • findWidgetToPrint

        protected com.guidewire.pl.web.widget.Widget findWidgetToPrint(com.guidewire.pl.web.config.PCFElement location,
                                                               java.lang.String widgetToPrintId,
                                                               java.lang.Class widgetType)
        Override the generic widget printer finder to use a more specific version that only looks for list view widgets with given ID. This circumvents the case where multiple items have the same name (in particular PanelRefs and contained LV's)
        Overrides:
        findWidgetToPrint in class PrintWidgetAction
        Parameters:
        location - Location to base search traversion on
        widgetToPrintId - ID of widget sought
        widgetType - type of widget sought
        Returns:
